Queries.Query: SELECT T0."DocEntry" FROM OACQ T0 WHERE T0."CreatedBy" = '{0}'

SELECT T4."SalesTax", T5."U_HCO_CtaIva", T3."Credit" FROM INV1 T0 INNER JOIN OINV T1 ON T0."DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry" INNER JOIN OJDT T2 ON T1."TransId" = T2."TransId" INNER JOIN JDT1 T3 ON T2."TransId" = T3."TransId" INNER JOIN OSTA T4 ON T3."Account" = T4."SalesTax" AND T0."TaxCode" = T4."Code" INNER JOIN OSTC T5 ON T4."Code" = T5."Code" WHERE T1."TransId" = {0} AND AND T5."U_HCO_CtaIva" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY T4."SalesTax", T5."U_HCO_CtaIva", T3."Credit"
SELECT T1."ItemCode" FROM {0} T0 INNER JOIN OITM T1 ON T0."ItemCode" = T1."ItemCode" WHERE T0."DocEntry" = {1} AND T1."ItemType" = 'F'

SELECT T0."TransId", T1."Account", T1."Line_ID", (CASE WHEN T1."Debit" > 0 THEN T2."U_HCO_RELPAR" WHEN T1."Credit" > 0 THEN T3."U_HCO_RELPAR" END) AS "Tercero" FROM OJDT T0 INNER JOIN (SELECT "TransId","Line_ID","Account","Debit","Credit", ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Partition BY "TransId", "DebCred")-1 AS "LineBase" FROM JDT1) T1 ON T0."TransId" = T1."TransId" INNER JOIN OVPM {0} ON T0."TransType" = T3."ObjType" AND T0."TransId" = T3."TransId" FULL OUTER JOIN {1} T2 ON T1."Account" = T2."AcctCode" AND T3."DocEntry" = T2."DocNum" AND T1."Account" = T2."AcctCode" AND  T2."SumApplied" = (CASE WHEN T1."Debit" = 0 THEN T1."Credit" ELSE T1."Debit" END) AND T2."LineId" = T1."LineBase" WHERE T1."TransId" = {2}
SELECT (CASE WHEN "U_ValLocal" = '{0}' THEN 'L' WHEN "U_ValIFRS" = '{0}' THEN 'I' ELSE 'C' END) AS "ValueDep" FROM "@HCO_RP0001"
SELECT T0."TransId", T1."DprArea" FROM OJDT T0 INNER JOIN ACQ2 T1 ON T0."TransId" = T1."TransNum" WHERE T0."U_HCO_ValAre" = 'C'

SELECT T2."DocNum", T0."TransId", T1."TransNum", T1."DprArea", T3."U_ValLocal", T3."U_ValIFRS", T0."U_HCO_ValAre" FROM OJDT T0 INNER JOIN ACQ2 T1 ON T0."TransId" = T1."TransNum" INNER JOIN OACQ T2 ON T1."DocEntry" = T2."DocEntry" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT "U_ValLocal", "U_ValIFRS" FROM "@HCO_RP0001" WHERE "Code" = '1' ) T3 ON T1."DprArea" = T3."U_ValLocal" OR T1."DprArea" = T3."U_ValIFRS" WHERE T0."U_HCO_ValAre" = 'C'
SELECT TOP 1 TA."TransId", TB."ShortName" AS "CardCode" FROM OJDT TA INNER JOIN JDT1 TB ON TA."TransId" = TB."TransId" WHERE TA."TransType" = '{0}' AND TA."CreatedBy" = '{1}'
SELECT TOP 1 "Code" FROM "@HCO_RP1101" WHERE "U_CardCode" = '{0}' GROUP BY "Code"
SELECT COUNT("CardCode") AS "Sec" FROM "OCRD" WHERE "LicTradNum" = '{0}' AND "CardType" = '{1}'
SELECT COUNT(1) AS "Cant" FROM "@HCO_RP1101" WHERE "U_CardCode" = '{0}' AND "U_CardType" = '{1}'
SELECT REPLACE("TableID",'@','') AS "TableID", "AliasID" FROM CUFD WHERE "TableID" LIKE '@HCO_%' OR "AliasID" LIKE 'HCO_%'
SELECT "CardCode" as "Código", "CardName" as "Nombre", "LicTradNum" as "Identificador" FROM OCRD where "CardCode" not in ( select distinct "U_CARDCODE" from "@HCO_RP1100")
SELECT COUNT(TA."LineNum") FROM "{0}" TA INNER JOIN "OSTC" TB ON TA."TaxCode" = TB."Code" WHERE TB."U_HCO_IvaCosto" = 'Y' AND TA."DocEntry" = '{1}'
